resources.string: An error occurred accessing the camera
An error occurred creating the video file
An error occurred saving the video file
An error occurred setting up the recorder
An error occurred, save folder changed to internal storage
Not much to do without accessing your camera and storage
We need the audio permission for recording videos

Show a photo preview after capturing
